name: Miius
tag_list: social, microblogging, videos, photos, networking, feelings
overview:
Miius is a social microblogging service which allows people to share, in a more direct way, the way they feel every day with the whole world. What makes you happy, angry or sad is always important to the ones who care about you.

By following the people you care, soon you will find out what they feel every day about anything that life throws at us. Filter by mood (angry, sad or happy) to find out what other people are feeling about a service or product, or perhaps a hotel they stayed in, and discover how many people feel the same way.

external_links.title: Miius.com - Share What You Are Doing
